content:
Set Up a Next Best Action

If you created a rule that triggers a next best action, set up an Einstein Next Best Action component to show recommendations to agents based on keywords during a conversation or intelligence signals from your telephony system. The component evaluates an incoming signal using predefined action strategies.

To show the recommendation, pass the keyword or detected signal to a Recommendation Strategy flow and link the flow to the Einstein Next Best Action component in a Lightning page.

Create the Recommendations
Create recommendations that suggest the next best action for agents while theyâ€™re working with your customers. For each recommendation, specify an action, which is configured as part of the Conversation Intelligence rule.

Create the Recommendation Strategy Flow for Next Best Action
Use Flow Builder to create a flow that determines how and when to present the Einstein Next Best Action recommendation on a Lightning page.

Pass the Rule Name as Input to a Flow
Add an input variable that stores the Conversation Intelligence rule developer name to pass a list of keywords to a Next Best Action or autolaunched flow.

Add the Einstein Next Best Action Component to the Voice Call Record Page
Add the component to the record page so agents see the Next Best Action recommendation.
title: Service Cloud Next Best Actions
